problem: 如图,AB是⊙O的弦(AB不是直径),以点A为圆心,以AB长为半径画弧交⊙O于点C,连结AC、BC、OB、OC．若∠ABC=65°,则∠BOC的度数是()
comment: 此题主要考查了圆周角定理以及等腰三角形的性质,正确得出∠A的度数是解题关键．
problem_en: As shown in the figure, AB is the chord of O (AB is not the diameter), with point A as the center, and AB length as the radius, draw an arc to intersect ⊙O at point C. Connect AC, BC, OB, OC. If ∠ABC = N_0, then the degree of ∠BOC is ()
